sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler = Class.create();

FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_DRAFT = "1";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_AWAITING_APPROVAL = "11";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_APPROVED = "13";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_AWAITING_QUALIFICATION = "15";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_QUALIFIED = "10";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_ASSIGNED = "16";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_WIP = "18";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CLOSE_COMPLETE = "3";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CLOSE_INCOMPLETE = "4";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CANCELLED = "7";
	
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_PENDING = "-5";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_OPEN = "1";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_WIP = "2";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_CLOSE_COMPLETE = "3";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_CLOSE_INCOMPLETE = "4";
FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_CLOSE_SKIPPED = "7";


FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.prototype = {
    
	workOrderProjectTaskStateMap : {
	},
	
	initialize: function() {
		this.workOrderProjectTaskStateMap[FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_WIP] = FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_WIP;
		this.workOrderProjectTaskStateMap[FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CLOSE_COMPLETE] = FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_CLOSE_COMPLETE;
		this.workOrderProjectTaskStateMap[FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CLOSE_INCOMPLETE] = FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_CLOSE_INCOMPLETE;
		this.workOrderProjectTaskStateMap[FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CANCELLED] = FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.PROJECT_TASK_STATE_CLOSE_SKIPPED;
		this.closedStates = [FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CLOSE_COMPLETE, FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CLOSE_INCOMPLETE, FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_CANCELLED];
		this.workStates = [FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_WIP];
		this.planningStates = [FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_DRAFT, FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_AWAITING_APPROVAL, FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_APPROVED, FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_AWAITING_QUALIFICATION, FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_QUALIFIED, FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler.WORK_ORDER_STATE_ASSIGNED];
    },
	
	getStateForProjectTaskFromWorkOrder : function (workOrder) {
		if(!workOrder || workOrder.getTableName() != "wm_order")
			return null;
		return this.getStateForProjectTask(workOrder.state);
	},
	
	getStateForProjectTask : function (workOrderState) {
		if(this.workOrderProjectTaskStateMap[workOrderState])
			return this.workOrderProjectTaskStateMap[workOrderState];
		return null;
	},
	
	isPlanningState : function (state) {
		state = state + "";
		var arrUtil = new ArrayUtil();
		if (arrUtil.contains(this.planningStates, state))
		   return true;
		
		return false;
	},
	
	isClosedState : function (state) {
		state = state + "";
		var arrUtil = new ArrayUtil();
		if (arrUtil.contains(this.closedStates, state))
		   return true;
		
		return false;
	},
	
	isWorkState : function (state) {
		state = state + "";
		var arrUtil = new ArrayUtil();
		if (arrUtil.contains(this.workStates, state))
		   return true;
		
		return false;
	},
	
	
	
	

    type: 'FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-07-08 00:03:48</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>136278e0c32022001c845cb981d3ae09</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FieldServiceProjectTaskStateHandler</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Field Service with Project Management" source="com.snc.wm_ppm">62b9197447320210cd4e1ce4316d4301</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_136278e0c32022001c845cb981d3ae09</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-07-08 00:35:25</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
